refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: SSL_load_client_CA_file() reads certificates from file and returns a STACK_OF(X509_NAME) with the subject names found.

refsection.title: NOTES
refsection.para: SSL_load_client_CA_file() reads a file of PEM formatted certificates and extracts the X509_NAMES of the certificates found. While the name suggests the specific usage as support function for SSL_CTX_set_client_CA_list 3 , it is not limited to CA certificates.
